about_the_game:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass Vol.2" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass Vol.2", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once.

Cards from Booster Pack “[D-BT08]: Minerva Rising” and some other PR cards will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “ [D-BT08]: Minerva Rising” via in-game shop or by crafting.
*Those PR cards are also included in this pack.

[INCLUDED PR CARDS]
・D-PR/390 Squalid Freaks
・D-PR/392 Forest Protecting Hunter, Prosper
・D-PR/394 Aren’t I Great to be Attending? Livora
・D-PR/402 Knight of Old Fate, Cordiela
・D-PR/404 Ardor Hatchet Dragon
・D-PR/406 Knight of Severity, Cliodhna
・D-PR/486 Stealth Dragon, Tsukuyodachi
・D-PR/488 Molecular Clause Dragon
・D-PR/490 Bringer of Soaring Wind, Lakche
・D-PR/498 Demonic Swordsman of Fracture, Eligos
・D-PR/500 Mobile Kennel, Eingarten
・D-PR/389 Phantasmic Stealth Fiend, Megalonozuchi
・D-PR/425 Flower of Ruined Castle, Empousa
・D-PR/504 Best Moment, Stolas

For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for " [D-BT08]: Minerva Rising" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.
detailed_description:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass Vol.2" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass Vol.2", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once.

Cards from Booster Pack “[D-BT08]: Minerva Rising” and some other PR cards will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “ [D-BT08]: Minerva Rising” via in-game shop or by crafting.
*Those PR cards are also included in this pack.
